name: Neongon
description:
This is our first gamejam, most of the assets including sprites, sounds and gameplay are authorial. 

The game was made on Unity Engine.

Instructions:

W, A, S, D - movement

Left mouse button - shoot

Mouse - aim

Credits:

https://github.com/hadryans

https://github.com/Kyuranagi

https://twitter.com/luqawtf

https://github.com/miguelhr00

SPOILER ALERT:

The game has four states of gameplay, each one with unique features. Be surprised.
